steel.name: Anchor Shot
steel.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

steel.name: Autotomize
steel.effect: Sharply raises the user's Dexterity by 2 and halves its weight.

steel.name: Behemoth Bash
steel.effect: If the target is Dynamaxed, this move's damage is doubled.

steel.name: Behemoth Blade
steel.effect: If the target is Dynamaxed, this move's damage is doubled.

steel.name: Bullet Punch
steel.effect: Priority.

steel.name: Corkscrew Crash
steel.effect: Z-Move. Base power and category depend on the original move.

steel.name: Doom Desire
steel.effect: An attack that will strike the target two turns later.

steel.name: Double Iron Bash
steel.effect: This move hits twice. Roll 1d6 for each hit. On a 6, the target Flinches.

steel.name: Flash Cannon
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1.

steel.name: Gear Grind
steel.effect: This move hits twice.

steel.name: Gear Up
steel.effect: Raises the Strength and Special of allies with the Plus or Minus Ability by 1.

steel.name: Gigaton Hammer
steel.effect: This move cannot be used twice in a row.

steel.name: Gyro Ball
steel.effect: Damage increases the slower the user is than the target.

steel.name: Heavy Slam
steel.effect: Damage increases based on how much heavier the user is than the target.

steel.name: Iron Defense
steel.effect: Sharply raises the user's Defense by 2.

steel.name: Iron Head
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

steel.name: Iron Tail
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1. Low Accuracy.

steel.name: King's Shield
steel.effect: Priority. Protects the user from all attacks. If a contact move is blocked, the attacker's Strength is lowered by 2. Changes Aegislash's form.

steel.name: Make It Rain
steel.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Lowers the user's Special by 1. Scatters coins.

steel.name: Metal Burst
steel.effect: Priority (goes last). Deals damage equal to 1.5 times the damage last taken by the user.

steel.name: Metal Claw
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the user's Strength is raised by 1.

steel.name: Metal Sound
steel.effect: Sharply lowers the target's Special Defense by 2.

steel.name: Meteor Mash
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the user's Strength is raised by 1.

steel.name: Mirror Shot
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Accuracy is lowered by 1.

steel.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
steel.effect: Z-Move. Ignores the target's Ability.

steel.name: Shift Gear
steel.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 1 and sharply raises its Dexterity by 2.

steel.name: Smart Strike
steel.effect: This move never misses.

steel.name: Spin Out
steel.effect: Sharply lowers the user's Dexterity by 2.

steel.name: Steel Beam
steel.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half of its max HP.

steel.name: Steel Roller
steel.effect: Destroys any active Terrain. Fails if no terrain is active.

steel.name: Steel Wing
steel.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the user's Defense is raised by 1.

steel.name: Sunsteel Strike
steel.effect: Ignores the target's Ability.

water.name: Aqua Cutter
water.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

water.name: Aqua Jet
water.effect: Priority.

water.name: Aqua Ring
water.effect: The user restores 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

water.name: Aqua Step
water.effect: Raises the user's Dexterity by 1.

water.name: Aqua Tail
water.effect: None.

water.name: Brine
water.effect: If the target has less than half HP, this move's damage is doubled.

water.name: Bubble
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

water.name: Bubble Beam
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

water.name: Bouncy Bubble
water.effect: The user recovers HP equal to half the damage dealt.

water.name: Chilling Water
water.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 1.

water.name: Clamp
water.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

water.name: Crabhammer
water.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

water.name: Dive
water.effect: The user dives underwater on the first turn, becoming invulnerable. On the second turn, it attacks.

water.name: Fishious Rend
water.effect: If the user acts before the target, this move's damage is doubled.

water.name: Flip Turn
water.effect: After attacking, the user switches out.

water.name: Hydro Cannon
water.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

water.name: Hydro Pump
water.effect: Low Accuracy.

water.name: Hydro Vortex
water.effect: Z-Move. Base power and category depend on the original move.

water.name: Jet Punch
water.effect: Priority.

water.name: Life Dew
water.effect: The user and its allies recover 1/4 of their max HP.

water.name: Liquidation
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

water.name: Octazooka
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Accuracy is lowered by 1.

water.name: Octolock
water.effect: The target is trapped and its Defense and Special Defense are lowered each turn.

water.name: Origin Pulse
water.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

water.name: Purify
water.effect: Cures an ally's status ailment and restores some of the user's HP.

water.name: Rain Dance
water.effect: Creates Rain Weather for 5 rounds.

water.name: Razor Shell
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

water.name: Scald
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

water.name: Snipe Shot
water.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Ignores redirection effects.

water.name: Soak
water.effect: Changes the target's type to Water.

water.name: Sparkling Aria
water.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon. Cures the target of its burn.

water.name: Splishy Splash
water.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets are Paralyzed.

water.name: Steam Eruption
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Burned.

water.name: Surf
water.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon. Deals double damage to Pokémon underwater.

water.name: Surging Strikes
water.effect: This move hits three times and is always a critical hit.

water.name: Water Gun
water.effect: None.

water.name: Water Pledge
water.effect: If used with Fire Pledge, creates a rainbow. If used with Grass Pledge, creates a swamp.

water.name: Water Pulse
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

water.name: Water Shuriken
water.effect: Priority. This move hits 2 to 5 times.

water.name: Water Spout
water.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Damage is reduced the lower the user's HP is.

water.name: Waterfall
water.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

water.name: Wave Crash
water.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.

water.name: Whirlpool
water.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

water.name: Withdraw
